name: Sounak Guha
desc: Highly skilled in design, integration, and intuitive problem-solving. Proficient in Java, C/C++, JavaScript, Python, and SQL. Passionate about launching innovative projects, translating business needs into technical solutions. Aspiring entry-level software engineer seeking opportunities with technology-driven firms.
footerdesc: Every great developer you know got there by solving problems which they were unqualified to solve until they actually did it.
footerslogan: Want to give me an opportunity?
